multiple-choice.question: We flip a fair coin three times; these flips are independent of each other. These three coin flips give us a sequence of length three, where each symbol is $H$ or $T$. Define the events [defs] A = "the sequence contains at most one $T$", B = "the symbols in the sequence are not all equal". [/defs] Which of the following is true?
multiple-choice.answer: The events $A$ and $B$ are not independent.
